    @allure.title('Test - create record & delete twice ')
    def test__create_get_delete_twice(self,base_api):
       # create a group
      group_endpoint = "group"
      json_data = load_json(file_paths["filter"])
      response_create = base_api.create(group_endpoint,json_data,need_random=True, field="name")
      assert response_create.status_code == 200
      group_id = response_create.json()['_id']
    
      # create workflow
      random = base_api.generate_ramdom(endpoint)
      json_data = load_json(file_paths["workflow"])
      json_data["name"] = random
      json_data["groups"] = [group_id]

testcase\ACS\test_workflow.py:58: 
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

self = <testcase.ACS.test_workflow.TestWorkflow object at 0x000001C3BF874CD0>
base_api = <utils.base_api_acs.BaseAPIACS object at 0x000001C3C2451D20>
endpoint = 'workflow'
json_data = {'actions': [{'actionType': 'Reboot'}], 'bPriorNewAndFailed': True, 'description': 'created by apple', 'execPolicy': {'initialTrigger': {'cpeEvent': 'CC EVENT - On Boot', 'type': 'CPE Event'}}, ...}

    def verify_create_get_delete_twice(self,base_api,endpoint,json_data):
        response_create = base_api.create(endpoint,json_data,need_random=False, field="name")
        assert response_create.status_code == 200
        model_id = response_create.json()['_id']
        print("the diff as following:" , DeepDiff(json_data,response_create.json()))
    
        # check if the record could be created with same key, 200 means Yes, 409 means No
        print("create the same body again")
        response_create = base_api.create(endpoint,json_data,need_random=False, field="name")
        assert response_create.status_code == 409
    
        # get the record
        response_get = base_api.get_by_id(endpoint,model_id)
        assert response_get.status_code == 200
    
        #  delete the record
        response_delete= base_api.delete(endpoint,params,model_id)
>       assert response_delete.status_code == 200
E       assert 500 == 200
E        +  where 500 = <Response [500]>.status_code

testcase\ACS\test_api_acs_common.py:50: AssertionError
